alert.note: Alert for Custer (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 31 at 12:30AM CDT until May 31 at 1:15AM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Custer County in central Nebraska... * Until 115 AM CDT. * At 1228 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Victoria Springs State Recreation Area to Callaway, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. At 1223 AM CDT, a wind gust to 58 mph was recorded at Broken Bow airport. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Broken Bow, Callaway, Sargent, Ansley, Merna, Mason City, Oconto, Anselmo, Comstock, Berwyn, Victoria Springs State Recreation Area, Weissert, Westerville, Lillian, Walworth, Lodi, Buckeye, Round Valley, Arcadia Diversion Dam State Wildlife Management Area and Burr Oak. This includes the following highways... Highway 183 between mile markers 73 and 121. Highway 2 between mile markers 258 and 306. Highway 92 between mile markers 265 and 308. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
